homepage.faq.q3.title.message: How to make a cryptocurrency deposit?

homepage.faq.q3.step2.desc.message: Request the public keys (wallets) linked to the customer at

homepage.faq.q5.intro.message: This flow is ideal for gateways that want to receive Pix payments (BRL) and have the balance automatically credited in Cryptocurrencies (ex: USDT) in your XGate account.

homepage.faq.q5.step1.desc.message: Make sure you are authenticated and have the

homepage.faq.q5.step1.desc2.message: of the payer generated at the route

homepage.faq.q5.step2.desc.message: Check the currency that the customer will use to pay at

homepage.faq.q5.step3.desc.message: Check the cryptocurrency you want to receive at

homepage.faq.q5.step4.title.message: Create the deposit and conversion request

homepage.faq.q5.step4.desc.message: Send the amount, customer ID and

homepage.faq.q5.step4.note.message: The API will return the status

homepage.faq.q5.step4.note3.message: Pix code for the customer to pay. As soon as it's cleared, the conversion to Crypto is instantaneous.

homepage.faq.q5.footer.message: For field details and errors, see the page

homepage.faq.q6.intro.message: This flow allows you to use your balance in Cryptocurrencies (ex: USDT) to make a payment via Pix (BRL) to a customer, with automatic exchange rate conversion.

homepage.faq.q6.step1.title.message: Identify the Customer and Create Pix Key

homepage.faq.q6.step1.desc2.message: and register the destination Pix key for this customer at the route

homepage.faq.q6.step1.note.message: The return of this route will provide the

homepage.faq.q6.step1.note2.message: of the Pix key, required for the final step.

homepage.faq.q6.step2.desc.message: To find out the exact amount in BRL before finalizing the withdrawal, send the complete cryptocurrency object to

homepage.faq.q6.step3.title.message: Create the withdrawal request with conversion

homepage.faq.q6.step3.desc3.message: of each resource retrieved in the previous steps.

homepage.faq.q6.step3.note.message: XGate will charge 10 USDT from your balance and send R$ 51.72 via Pix to the key provided.

homepage.faq.q6.footer.message: For field details and errors, see the page

homepage.faq.q6.footer.link.message: Create Crypto Withdrawal converting to FIAT

homepage.faq.q7.intro.message: If you prefer not to use the API to create sub-accounts, you can perform the process manually through the XGate Backoffice.

homepage.faq.q7.step1.desc.message: In the left sidebar of your panel, locate and click on the option

homepage.faq.q7.step2.desc.message: Within the section, click on the button

homepage.faq.q7.step2.desc2.message: located at the top of the page.

homepage.faq.q7.step3.desc.message: On the list screen, click the blue button

homepage.faq.q7.step4.desc.message: A form will be displayed. Fill in all the data of the new company (Sub-account) and especially the fee rules (Fees) that you want to apply. When finished, click the button

homepage.faq.q7.step4.desc2.message: at the end of the form.

homepage.faq.q7.step4.note.message: The partner will receive credentials from your email and you will be able to track the volume transacted by them in real time.

homepage.faq.q7.footer.message: Learn how to automate this at

homepage.features.getStarted.description.message: Learn the basics of our API: how to authenticate and make your first call in less than 5 minutes.

homepage.features.apiReference.descripti.message: Explore all endpoints. See details about Deposits, Withdrawals, Customers, PIX and much more.

homepage.features.sdksPackages.descripti.message: Integrate faster with our packages. We have ready-made examples in Javascript (NPM), Python (Pip) and PHP (Composer).

homepage.faq.q4.intro.message: This flow allows you to send cryptocurrencies from your XGate balance directly to an external wallet (e.g., Metamask, Ledger, or Exchange).

homepage.faq.q4.step1.desc.message: Make sure the receiving customer is registered at the route

homepage.faq.q4.step2.desc.network.message: Check the blockchain networks enabled for withdrawal at

homepage.faq.q4.step2.desc.crypto.message: And fetch the desired cryptocurrency data at the route

homepage.faq.q4.step3.desc3.message: destination is provided at the end of the object, after the network definitions.
